Title: A Couple of Choices
Plot: Allison has a dream of a husband and wife committing a murder/suicide. D.A. Devalos introduces her to a friend of his, Detective Lee Scanlon, who's sister and brother in-law's deaths were also ruled a murder/suicide, and sees a connection.  After learning about Allison's methods of investigation, Scanlon decides he doesn't want her help.
GuestStars: Silas Weir Mitchell, Donna Bullock, Jon Sklaroff, Paul Schackman, Sam Vance, Neal Matarazzo, Brandon Keener, Phe Caplan, Pia Artesona, Seth Walker
